title: Commonwealth Review. No. 11
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: The construction of Britain’s new V.C.10 jet liner and its test flight to Ghana; the Amateur Boxing International in Dublin; Beekeeping in Australia; The Overseas Film School in Britain where students learn the techniques of film production; Art exhibitions in London by Indian children and Ceylonese adults; A gala concert given by the Ceylonese High Commissioner, Dr Malalesekera, in London; Motor racing on ice in Canada.
